title.rendered: How to Obtain Canada PR in 2023?

  • How Will Canada’s Express Entry Change in 2023?
  • What is Considered a Good CRS Score for Canada PR in 2023?
  • Top Immigration Programs for Canada PR Visa in 2023
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Thousands of people apply for Canadian immigration through the Express Entry system yearly. This system selects candidates based on the points they score on an immigration program.

The points required to receive an Invitation to Apply (ITA) skyrocketed during the COVID-19 pandemic, and the points threshold for each Express Entry draw is still very high. This means many people aren’t likely to qualify for an ITA due to low points. However, the Canadian Government’s Bill C-19 offers hope for some prospective immigrants.

In this guide, we will examine how the Express System is changing in 2023 and how you may be able to qualify for Canada PR Visa.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

How Will Canada’s Express Entry Change in 2023?

The Canadian Government is planning to give 465,000 people Canada PR in 2023. This figure will rise to 485,000 in 2024 and 500,000 in 2025. Many of these people will be chosen through the Express Entry System, which will change due to Bill C-19 in 2023.

The Express Entry system has traditionally chosen candidates based on the points they score from possessing skills, education, and language proficiency. Once Bill C-19 comes into effect, the Express Entry system will also start choosing candidates based on their occupation, education, or language, even if their CRS is low.

The Canadian Government implemented these changes to help address labour shortages in key industries and occupations. These “targeted draws” give hope to people with low CRS scores who couldn’t qualify for an ITA through the usual Express Entry route.

Canada Immigration Levels Plan 2023-2025[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

What is Considered a Good CRS Score for Canada PR in 2023?

CRS scores between 470 and 495 are considered good scores in 2023. Candidates with such scores stand a high chance of receiving an ITA through Express Entry Canada 2023 draws. If your CRS score is below 470, you may still receive an ITA if you possess the skills, education, or language proficiency the Canadian Government is targeting with its new targeted draws.

What is a Good CRS Score for Canada PR in 2023?[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”12969″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Ready to Immigrate to Canada in 2023?

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Book a consultation” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/book-consultation/” margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Top Immigration Programs for Canada PR Visa in 2023

The top programs for Canadian immigration in 2023 are:

Express Entry

The Express Entry system remains one of the most popular immigration routes for prospective immigrants. However, the CRS points required to receive an ITA are expected to remain high. This is because many applicants have high CRS scores, and the score threshold can’t come down until each one has received their ITA.

This problem will likely persist as new candidates enter the Express Entry pool daily. If you want to apply for Canadian immigration through the Express Entry system, you should look for ways to boost your CRS Score. This includes additional educational credentials, work experience, and a higher language proficiency exam score.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Provincial Nominee Program

Dozens of Provincial Nominee Programs cater to people with different skill sets and backgrounds. You can apply for Canadian immigration through one of these programs if you possess a valid job offer from a Canadian employer in one of these provinces. Provincial Nominee Programs are less competitive than Express Entry, so you may find it easier to immigrate through one of these programs.

Business Immigration Programs

Business immigration programs will also remain popular in 2023. These offer a route for PR by investment in Canada. Business owners and entrepreneurs can pursue this immigration route by setting up or purchasing a business in Canada.

Most Canadian provinces offer business immigration programs to encourage foreign investment and create more jobs for Canadians. In addition, programs such Intra-Company Transfer (ICT), Owner Operator LMIA, C10 Visa & C11 Visa also offer pathways to Canadian immigration. You can pursue this route if you have business ownership or management experience and the funds to set up a business.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”11994″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Check Your Eligibility for Canadian Immigration

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Start Assessment” url=”https://www.immefile.ca/public/assessment/elaarimmigration” margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Family Class Immigration

The family-class immigration programs will remain unchanged in 2023. These programs allow a Canadian permanent resident to sponsor a spouse, parent, or dependent child for Canadian immigration. This immigration method is useful if the sponsored person has the skills or qualifications to immigrate using the Express Entry system or any Provincial Nominee Program.

Quebec Immigration

Quebec offers many immigration programs. Most prefer French-speaking skilled workers, entrepreneurs, and investors who can contribute to the province’s economy. These programs differ distinctly from other provincial nominee programs so they may be a good fit for French-speaking candidates.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Need help?” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]If you’re interested in immigrating to Canada in 2023, please get in touch with Colossus Migration. Our experienced Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultants keep track of each Canadian immigration program and can guide you in choosing the one that offers the greatest chance of success.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-4-percent” column_padding_tablet=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”left-right” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”4/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJtbC1mb3JtLWVtYmVkJTIyJTBBJTIwJTIwZGF0YS1hY2NvdW50JTNEJTIyMzgxOTE0NiUzQWIyYzNtMHIxYzklMjIlMEElMjAlMjBkYXRhLWZvcm0lM0QlMjI1NDY1NDI2JTNBdTJ4Mms4JTIyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Trending Stories” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1644853159092{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][recent_posts style=”list_featured_first_row” columns=”1″ category=”all” order=”DESC” orderby=”date” image_loading=”default” blog_remove_post_date=”true” blog_remove_post_author=”true” blog_remove_post_comment_number=”true” blog_remove_post_nectar_love=”true” posts_per_page=”5″ post_offset=”1″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: How to Obtain Canada PR in 2023? Here is what to expect in Canadian immigration in 2023.
